content: *a pretty hip-length open-front vest with a single button closure that s flattering and simple to make lionbrand com * lion brand pattern # 20064 *20064-c pdf* skill level easy size xs small medium large 1x 2x 3x jiffy® article #450 5-7 balls print crochet hook - size j-10 6 mm split ring stitch markers one 1-inch 25 mm button pieces left front right front back finishing sew shoulders together sew side seams leaving 4-inch side slits work crochet edging sew on button see vest in-a-jiffy knit 1 for the knit version *free registration at lionbrand com required to access pattern * 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/vest-in-a-jiffy-knit
